summary: A .bat file that generates .SEQ files using the CK
descriptionHtml:
[size=48]READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE DOWNLOADING![/size]





Instructions:

1) Open up \"Generate SEQ file.bat\" file in notepad/wordpad
2) Change \"E:\" to the root drive which has your Skyrim folder in it (NOT THE \"MY GAMES\" drive!)
3) Change \"E:\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\" to your Skyrim folder (The folder which has TESV.exe in it)
4) Save changes
5) Run the .bat
6) Type in your plugin name (including the .esp), like so: \"MyPluginName.esp\"
7) Press Enter
8) Wait
9) Move .SEQ file to \"Data\\SEQ\"
10) Profit!
author: FiftyTifty
